_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Fabric Server
author: wowid3@example.com
description: High-performance Fabric modded Minecraft server. Automatically downloads Fabric server JAR during installation.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Fabric Server Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server

apt update
apt install -y curl jq

cd /mnt/server

echo "=========================================="
echo "Fabric Server Installation"
echo "=========================================="
echo ""

# Resolve Minecraft version
if [ -z "$MC_VERSION" ] || [ "$MC_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
    echo "Resolving latest stable Minecraft version..."
    MC_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/game | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==true) | .version' | head -n1)
    echo "Resolved to: ${MC_VERSION}"
elif [ "$MC_VERSION" == "snapshot" ]; then
    echo "Resolving latest snapshot Minecraft version..."
    MC_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/game | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==false) | .version' | head -n1)
    echo "Resolved to: ${MC_VERSION}"
else
    echo "Using Minecraft version: ${MC_VERSION}"
fi

# Resolve Fabric installer version
if [ -z "$FABRIC_VERSION" ] || [ "$FABRIC_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
    echo "Resolving latest Fabric installer version..."
    FABRIC_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/installer | jq -r '.[0].version')
    echo "Resolved to: ${FABRIC_VERSION}"
else
    echo "Using Fabric installer version: ${FABRIC_VERSION}"
fi

# Resolve Fabric loader version
if [ -z "$LOADER_VERSION" ] || [ "$LOADER_VERSION" == "latest" ]; then
    echo "Resolving latest stable Fabric loader version..."
    LOADER_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/loader | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==true) | .version' | head -n1)
    echo "Resolved to: ${LOADER_VERSION}"
elif [ "$LOADER_VERSION" == "snapshot" ]; then
    echo "Resolving latest snapshot Fabric loader version..."
    LOADER_VERSION=$(curl -sSL https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/loader | jq -r '.[] | select(.stable==false) | .version' | head -n1)
    echo "Resolved to: ${LOADER_VERSION}"
else
    echo "Using Fabric loader version: ${LOADER_VERSION}"
fi

echo ""
echo "Configuration:"
echo "  Minecraft: ${MC_VERSION}"
echo "  Fabric Installer: ${FABRIC_VERSION}"
echo "  Fabric Loader: ${LOADER_VERSION}"
echo ""

# Remove spaces from version numbers
MC_VERSION="$(echo "${MC_VERSION}" | tr -d ' ')"
FABRIC_VERSION="$(echo "${FABRIC_VERSION}" | tr -d ' ')"
LOADER_VERSION="$(echo "${LOADER_VERSION}" | tr -d ' ')"

# Validate required variables
if [[ -z "${MC_VERSION}" ]] || [[ -z "${FABRIC_VERSION}" ]] || [[ -z "${LOADER_VERSION}" ]]; then
    echo "ERROR: Failed to resolve required versions"
    exit 1
fi

# Build download URL for direct Fabric server JAR
DOWNLOAD_URL="https://meta.fabricmc.net/v2/versions/loader/${MC_VERSION}/${LOADER_VERSION}/${FABRIC_VERSION}/server/jar"

echo "Download URL: ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
echo ""

# Download Fabric server JAR
echo "Downloading Fabric server JAR..."
curl -o "${SERVER_JARFILE}" -L "${DOWNLOAD_URL}"

if [[ $? -ne 0 ]]; then
    echo "ERROR: Failed to download Fabric server JAR"
    echo "URL: ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
    exit 1
fi

if [[ ! -f "${SERVER_JARFILE}" ]]; then
    echo "ERROR: Server JAR was not downloaded"
    exit 1
fi

echo "✓ Fabric server JAR downloaded successfully"
echo "  File: ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
echo "  Size: $(du -h ${SERVER_JARFILE} | cut -f1)"
echo ""

# Create necessary directories
echo "Creating server directories..."
mkdir -p mods config world logs
mkdir -p kubejs/server_scripts kubejs/startup_scripts 2>/dev/null || true
# Pre-create .fabric directory for Fabric server launcher
mkdir -p .fabric/server .fabric/libraries 2>/dev/null || true
echo "✓ Directories created"

# Set up EULA
echo ""
echo "Creating eula.txt..."
cat > eula.txt << 'EOF'
#By changing the setting below to TRUE you are indicating your agreement to our EULA (https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula).
eula=true
EOF
echo "✓ EULA accepted"

# Create default server.properties
echo ""
echo "Creating default server.properties..."
cat > server.properties << 'EOF'
#Minecraft server properties
motd=A Minecraft Server
server-port=25565
max-players=20
online-mode=true
white-list=false
pvp=true
difficulty=easy
hardcore=false
view-distance=10
simulation-distance=10
spawn-protection=16
max-tick-time=60000
enable-command-block=false
EOF
echo "✓ Default server.properties created"

echo ""
echo "=========================================="
echo "Installation Summary"
echo "=========================================="
echo "Minecraft: ${MC_VERSION}"
echo "Fabric Installer: ${FABRIC_VERSION}"
echo "Fabric Loader: ${LOADER_VERSION}"
echo "Server JAR: ${SERVER_JARFILE}"
echo "Working Directory: $(pwd)"
echo "EULA: Accepted"
echo ""
echo "Installation complete!"
echo "You can now upload mods to the mods/ directory."
echo "=========================================="

variables.name: Server JAR File
variables.description: The name of the server JAR file

variables.name: Fabric Version
variables.description: The Fabric installer version. Use 'latest' or specific version (e.g., 1.1.0). Check https://fabricmc.net/use/installer

variables.name: Fabric Loader Version
variables.description: The Fabric loader version. Use 'latest' or specific version (e.g., 0.17.3). Check https://fabricmc.net/versions.html

variables.name: Maximum RAM Percentage
variables.description: Maximum percentage of allocated memory to use. Default 95% ensures some memory for system overhead.

variables.name: JVM Arguments
variables.description: Additional JVM arguments for optimal performance. Includes G1GC tuning for modded servers.
